Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    io.pravega.client.batch.BatchClient
    BatchClientFactory instead.
    io.pravega.client.byteStream.ByteStreamClient
    Use ByteStreamClientFactory instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    io.pravega.client.batch.StreamInfo
    This class is deprecated and will be removed in the subsequent releases. Use StreamManager.getStreamInfo(String, String) to fetch StreamInfo represented by StreamInfo.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.pravega.client.stream.EventStreamWriter.beginTxn()
    Use EventStreamClientFactory.createTransactionalEventWriter(String, String, Serializer, EventWriterConfig) instead
    io.pravega.client.ClientFactory.createBatchClient()
    Use BatchClientFactory.withScope(String, ClientConfig)
    io.pravega.client.ClientFactory.createByteStreamClient()
    Use ByteStreamClientFactory.withScope(String, ClientConfig)
    io.pravega.client.ClientFactory.createEventWriter(String, Serializer<T>, EventWriterConfig)
    Use EventStreamClientFactory.createEventWriter(String, Serializer, EventWriterConfig) instead
    io.pravega.client.ClientFactory.createReader(String, String, Serializer<T>, ReaderConfig)
    Use EventStreamClientFactory.createReader(String, String, Serializer, ReaderConfig) instead
    io.pravega.client.ClientFactory.createRevisionedStreamClient(String, Serializer<T>, SynchronizerConfig)
    Use SynchronizerClientFactory.createRevisionedStreamClient(String, Serializer, SynchronizerConfig) instead.
    io.pravega.client.ClientFactory.createStateSynchronizer(String, Serializer<UpdateT>, Serializer<InitT>, SynchronizerConfig)
    Use SynchronizerClientFactory.createStateSynchronizer(String, Serializer, Serializer, SynchronizerConfig) instead.
    io.pravega.client.batch.BatchClient.getStreamInfo(Stream)
    Use StreamManager.getStreamInfo(String, String) to fetch StreamInfo.
    io.pravega.client.stream.EventStreamWriter.getTxn(UUID)
    Use EventStreamClientFactory.createTransactionalEventWriter(String, String, Serializer, EventWriterConfig) instead
    io.pravega.client.stream.ReaderGroup.resetReadersToCheckpoint(Checkpoint)
    Use ReaderGroup.resetReaderGroup(ReaderGroupConfig) to reset readers to a given Checkpoint.
    io.pravega.client.stream.StreamConfiguration.StreamConfigurationBuilder.scope(String)
    Does nothing.
    io.pravega.client.stream.StreamConfiguration.StreamConfigurationBuilder.streamName(String)
    Does nothing.
    io.pravega.client.ClientFactory.withScope(String, URI)
    Use ClientFactory.withScope(String, ClientConfig)
